com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.databinding

Class BindingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.databinding.BindingHelper

  • public class BindingHelper
extends Object
    Contains the BindingAdapter used for gathering bound attributes.

      • getBindings

        public static HashMap<Integer,String> getBindings(String indexVariant)
        Gets the current bindings.
        Returns:
        a SparseArray mapping each View's id to its attribute name.

        @Nullable
public static String setVariantForView(@NonNull
                                                 View view,
                                                 @NonNull
                                                 AttributeSet attrs)
        Associates programmatically a view with its variant, taking it from its `variant` layout attribute.
        Parameters:
        view - any existing view.
        attrs - the view's AttributeSet.
        Returns:
        the previous variant for this view, if any.

      • getVariantForView

        @Nullable
public static String getVariantForView(@NonNull
                                                 View view)
        Returns the variant associated with the view.
        Parameters:
        view - a View that is associated to an index through databinding.
        Returns:
        the variant name or null if unspecified.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the view is not part of a databinding layout.

      • isBound

        public static boolean isBound(int viewId)

      • getFullAttribute

        @NonNull
public static String getFullAttribute(@NonNull
                                               View view,
                                               @Nullable
                                               String rawAttributeValue)
        Gets the full version of an attribute, with its eventual prefix and suffix.
        Parameters:
        view - the view mapped to this attribute.
        rawAttributeValue - the raw value of the attribute.
        Returns:
        the attribute value, prefixed and suffixed if any was specified on the view.

      • getSuffix

        @Nullable
public static String getSuffix(@NonNull
                                         View view)
        Gets the prefix for a given view, if any.
        Parameters:
        view - a view mapped to an attribute.
        Returns:
        the prefix for this view, or null if none was set.

      • getPrefix

        @Nullable
public static String getPrefix(@NonNull
                                         View view)
        Gets the suffix for a given view, if any.
        Parameters:
        view - a view mapped to an attribute.
        Returns:
        the suffix for this view, or null if none was set.
